paper_abstract: This article approaches a detailed analysis of hybrid vehicles and their components by using a mathematical model programmed in Matlab-Simulink. This model has been developed to enable students to adopt a global approach, tackling aspects of different subjects of Mechanical Engineering studies. The program is also used to supplement practical laboratory sessions. (C) 2009 Wiley Periodicals, Inc. Comput Appl Eng Educ 19: 604-614, 2011; View this article online at wileyonlinelibrary.com/journal/cae; DOI 10.1002/cae.20341
paper_title: Simulation and Testing of Hybrid Vehicle Function as Part of a Multidisciplinary Training
